DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study will be to assess whether forced air warming decreases the rate of surgical site infections following cesarean section.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Forced Air Warming During Cesarean Section on Postoperative Infectious Morbidity
DOC.detailed_description: Given the physiologic and experimental evidence regarding temperature regulation; it remains convincing that forced air warming is protective against the development of SSI. We will set out to prospectively study the effect of forced air warming on patients undergoing cesarean section.
